name: enumify
description: A JavaScript library for enums. To be used by transpiled ES6 (e.g. via Babel).

1.0.0.name: enumify

scripts.build-test-es5: npm run build && babel test --out-dir test-es5 && sed -i '' 's/src\/enumify/lib\/enumify/' test-es5/enumify_test.js

1.0.0.description: A JavaScript library for enums. To be used by transpiled ES6 (e.g. via Babel).
